description: MainActivity class for an Android TV application, extending FragmentActivity to handle UI initialization and key events for remote control interaction.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity class tailored for Android TV, manages UI setup and remote control inputs.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes activity, sets layout, and configures UI components.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles remote control key events such as navigation and selection.
